comments: Waste Oil and Generator Upgrade at Rogers Pass, BC:-Removal of Waste Oil tank bottom residual. Existing Oil pump out by Company that is already providing this service to client -Removal and decommissioning of existing tank from site and recycled with documentation. -Install new Owner supplied tank and appurtenances -Supply and Install two used Highway Barriers as crash protection in front of new tank installation. -Supply and installation of all related electrical works as shown on Drawings. -Painting and labeling of Supply and Return piping -All works conducted by BC Government Certified Petroleum Equipment Installers. Generator -Removal of two drums of existing fuel from current inventory to set up temporary fuel delivery system to generator while work is being conducted on new installation. -The removal of tank bottom residuals. The bulk of the fuel to be pumped out by others. -Removal and decommissioning of existing tank from site and recycled along with documentation. -Install new Owner supplied tank and appurtenances as shown on drawings. -Painting and labeling of Supply and Return lines. -As-Builds of both installations.
